objective:
Objective:

Learn how to enhance accessibility by providing extra context for an input field using the ariaDescribedBy or Description property.
task:
Task:

You are provided with a input field with Description where the user needs to input a temperature value.

However, there is no clear indication of whether the temperature should be entered in Celsius or Fahrenheit.

Modify the code to ensure that this extra information (Description) is conveyed to users.
instruction:
Instruction:

In the file /webapp/exercises/Exercise06.fragment.xml add the description property in the Input control.
howToTest:
How to test:

  • Use NVDA (Screen Reader) to inspect the Input Control. It should vocalize the Label and the Description when the Input Control is focused.
helpCode:
<Input
  id="idExercise06Input"
  //Take a look at description property for sap.m.Input control
/>
